page.title: 08A TYPICAL DAY
page.content: This morning I woke up at 6.30a.m. I got washed and dressed.For breakfast I had sugar puffs .Sugar puffs are balls of wheat covered in sugas to which you add milk.Then I had a glass of fruit juice.After breakfast I cleaned my teeth,brushed my hair then went to school for registration.We had an assembly in the village hall.Back in school we did some work about "camp".I made a model of an old engine house and chimney with my friend Laura.For dinner I had roast ham and vegetables.For pudding I had carabar which is a biscuit with a toffee and chocolate coating.At playtime I played chase.In the afternoon we did more camp work then had a story before going home.I played on the swing then had tea.Ihad cheese on toast followed by an apple and some chocolate.Iplayed some more,watched T.V.and went to bed.
